backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, admin management, user profiles, and ticket/contact-form storage with initialization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the requirement to make long admin-panel ticket messages fully viewable via a modal or drawer.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their components and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode values, and global style rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app composing all sections, admin gate logic, and the password modal.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI card shown when a user lacks admin permissions, offering login or retry actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderManage: Admin dashboard handling order creation, status updates, access-control initialization, and sub‑sections for quotes, tracking, and principals.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderTracki: Admin tool for searching tracking codes and managing arrival, restoration steps, and shipping status.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordPro: Modal prompting for an admin password and unlocking the admin section with success scroll behavior and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminPrincipalMa: Admin UI for adding principals to the allowlist and listing current admin principals with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/AdminQuoteFormsS: Displays all submitted quote tickets, supports viewing full messages and toggling completion status with mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Public contact form allowing users to submit quote requests with validation, mutation submission, and success alert.
frontend/src/components/FullTicketMessag: Modal showing a ticket’s full message details including name, email, category, and content with scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing page hero section with background image, headline, CTAs, and scroll-to-section functionality.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication state and handles login, logout, and error cases.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: UI section rendering three service tiers with pricing, features, and a scroll-to-contact action.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, navigation links, social media, and admin-gated access logic.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with scroll-aware styling, navigation links, mobile menu, and admin-gated access.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Package tracking form that queries backend tracking data and displays progress, status badges, and timestamps.
frontend/src/context/AdminGateContext.ts: Context managing admin-gate state including unlock prompts and access control helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to identity with secret-based access initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated admin-capable actor without secret initialization and caching it.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAllowlistQuer: Hooks for querying and mutating the admin allowlist, including validation and permission error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Hook fetching backend initialization diagnostics for admin users.
Provides React Query hooks for admins to create orders, update order status, list all orders, check admin rights, and initialize access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTicketQueries: Defines admin hooks to list all tickets and update ticket status with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTrackingManag: Implements admin tracking hooks to fetch tracking state and manage package arrival and restoration steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a hook to submit a contact form using an actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Adds a hook to retrieve tracking state and order status for a package with combined error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes including logo styling.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Utility to build BASE_URL-aware asset URLs by normalizing base and path formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatusLabel.ts: Maps OrderStatus enum values to human-readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, issues, and state for the admin panel enhancement regarding full message viewing.
